node.title: Police video reveals the lies a killer told as he tried to get away with murdering his wife
node.description: In what could easily be a scene from a Hollywood thriller, aÂ police camera captures 59-year-old father Andrew John Cobby spin a web of lies about the murder of his estranged wife Kym.
node.content:
["In what could easily be a scene from a Hollywood thriller, a\u00a0police camera captures 59-year-old father Andrew John Cobby spinning a web of lies about the murder of his estranged wife Kym.", "Warning: This story contains details that some readers may find distressing.", "After being captured just minutes after Kym's brutal murder, he sobs: \"Oh, no, please, no \u2014 she's the love of my life\".", "But he had just bashed in her head with a hammer and left her alone to choke to death in the driveway of her Gold Coast hinterland home in November 2017.", "He thought he would get away with the crime, fabricating an elaborate story and blaming a fictitious attacker for killing 51-year-old Kym Cobby.", "He told police in a recording\u00a0while he was being tended to by paramedics in an ambulance of\u00a0how he loved her and called her \"honey\u00a0bunny and my darling\".", "He told police someone had been trying to extort millions of dollars from the couple, and on the night of her murder, he said\u00a0Kym had called him after seeing a man lurking on the property.", "As the questions kept on coming, he breaks down and sobs hysterically, shouting: \"Oh no, oh no, she was so scared of this, oh no.\"", "", "
Andrew Cobby fabricated an elaborate story and blamed a fictitious attacker for killing his wife Kym.(Supplied)
", "
'I am a coward'
", "It was an acting performance that was peppered with questions about how Kym was.", "\"How is Kym, please tell me, please tell me, please tell,\" as Cobby cries in the back of the ambulance.", "But he knew the mother of his three children was long dead.", "The police video and transcripts of his alibi were released after a joint media application to the Supreme Court in Brisbane.", "The convicted murderer tells police he did not actually see anyone at first, but then a \"guy came at us\" as he headed back to his car.", "\"Yeah, and he got Kym first because I was by the car,\" Cobby said.", "\"He got Kym and I turned around and tried to protect her and he just laid into us \u2014 Kym took the brunt of it.", "\"I tried to stop him, went around from behind \u2014 I did not have the strength to stop him.", "", "
The crime scene outside Kym Cobby's home at Worongary on Queensland's Gold Coast hinterland in November 2017.(Queensland Police Service)
", "\"I laid over Kym, tried to protect her and I got hit on the back of the head.", "\"I panicked and I went down the hill and that is about as much as I remember.", "\"Kym has been concerned that someone has been watching her and following her \u2026 and Kym has been spending time with me because she does not feel safe at the farm.", "\"I am a coward but I ran.\u00a0\u00a0I am in front of a car,\u00a0 [ran] over grass, down a hill \u2014 I thought I was being followed so I ducked in somewhere, tripped and fell on stones \u2014\u00a0I do not remember much after that.\"", "", "
Andrew Cobby sits in the back of a police car after his arrest for the murder of his wife Kym.(ABC News)
", "
No motive offered for the killing
", "During the trial, the court heard Ms Cobby's body was discovered by a family member, moments after she was attacked, on the side of the road outside their Worongary property on Queensland's Gold Coast hinterland.", "The couple had been separated but had remained in contact.", "More than 50 witnesses were called during the four-week trial, with the jury taking two days of deliberations to find him guilty of murder.", "In the dock stood a very different man to the allegedly heartbroken estranged husband of\u00a0a woman who had been ambushed by a stranger.", "There were no tears, no relentless sobbing, just a man in denial, who showed little emotion as the verdict was delivered.", "The court had heard Cobby murdered his 51-year-old wife by beating her with a claw hammer, before choking her to death.", "Cobby was found hiding in bushes in a nearby street to his wife's Worongary property and was later arrested and charged.", "He has offered no motive for the killing.", "", "
The court heard Cobby murdered his wife by beating her with a claw hammer, before choking her to death.(Queensland Police Service)
", "
'Capacity for deception'
", "A swindler and a coward who staged a \"remarkable performance\", was how Justice Peter Callaghan described him during sentencing.", "\"Yours is a most extraordinary case \u2014\u00a0there is simply no doubt that you took with you that night a hammer and removed it from the car with an intent to use it,\" Justice Callaghan said.", "\"Your crime was clearly premeditated.", "\"It was also sickening because you used that hammer to inflict violence to the head of an unarmed woman.", "\"We've all had to see the photos \u2014\u00a0they're painful enough but we've also heard her screams \u2014\u00a0they are not things that anyone in this room will ever forget.", "\"It is just frightening that you could maintain a murderous intent for the length of time that it took to extinguish Kym's life, even as she fought \u2014\u00a0valiantly it seems \u2014 to remove your hands from her throat.", "", "
Cobby has offered no motive for killing his wife Kym.(Supplied)
", "\"You were no doubt using the strength that you had built from giving massages, such as the ones that you had given to your own family, so recently.", "\"And what all puts all of this totally beyond comprehension is that there is just no discernible motive.", "\"Your relationship with Kym was clearly unusual but it had persisted over the decades and she was your support.", "\"We know, from what we've just heard, she was actually the only support you had in life.", "\"In your whole life, there was one person who stood by you and you did these extraordinary things to her.", "\"Standing by you all those years would not have been an easy thing to do, given your capacity for deception and your unreliability.", "\"I am not sure there was much else in your life for which you want to be remembered, but it is still possible that you could still do one remarkable thing in your life and it would be truly remarkable if even now, at this point, you found the good in yourself to simply tell the truth.", "\"You can still do that and you will have the time to think about whether you will \u2014\u00a0in the meantime you are convicted of the offence of murder.", "\"I make the finding that the offence is a domestic violence offence and that you have been sentenced for it.", "
'One more moment with her'
", "It was the ultimate betrayal, with Cobby's adult children Luke, Ella and Joel saying there would never be forgiveness and they would just like to know why.", "They said there was domestic violence in the relationship and claimed their mother had wanted a divorce.", "Oldest son Joel Cobby said he just wished he could get his mum back and have \"one more moment with her\".", "They said Kym\u00a0was a bubbly, beautiful mother\u00a0who cared deeply for her family.", "", "
Kym's adult children said she\u00a0was a bubbly, beautiful mother\u00a0who cared deeply for her family.(Supplied)
"]
